pr_title: Load permissions before tenant init OKAPI-859

timeline.message: Invoke permissions before tenant init OKAPI-859

If enabling permissiond module, call permissions after tenant init

This slightly reverts the previous work in this branch. Even for
permissions module, the tenant init must be executed before posting
permissions.

timeline.bodyText: Can the unused parameter mdFrom been removed?

timeline.bodyText: The names of res3 und res4 should be swapped.
